title: World War 4 + Kandahar Break | 2 Full Action War Movies | Double Feature Movie

sources.title: World War 4 + Kandahar Break | 2 Full Action War Movies | Double Feature Movie
sources.description:
World War 4: A series of escalating incidents in Korea and the Middle East lead to greater and greater conflict, placing the superpowers at one another's throats. Armies march, bombs rain down, soldiers storm the beaches. One family is caught up in the ever-growing conflict. Can they survive?
2019. Stars: Morgan Bradley, Graham Vincent, Frederick Dodson

Kandahar Break: Â In 1999, a British mine clearance engineer working for the Taliban government in Afghanistan must flee the country when he becomes embroiled in a deadly game of intrigue and betrayal.
2009. Stars: Shaun Dooley, Dean Andrews, Rasheed Naz
